chooseLanguageGiscusDisplayed: Choose the language giscus will be displayed in. Can't find your language? Contribute a localization.
chooseTheRepository: Choose the repository giscus will connect to. Make sure that:
theRepositoryIsPublic: The repository is public, otherwise visitors will not be able to view the discussion.
theGiscusAppIsInstalled: The giscus app is installed, otherwise visitors will not be able to comment and react.
theDiscussionsFeatureIsTurnedOn: The Discussions feature is turned on by enabling it for your repository.
cannotUseGiscusOnThisRepository: Cannot use giscus on this repository. Make sure all of the above criteria has been met.
successRepositoryMeetsCriteria: Success! This repository meets all of the above criteria.
aPublicGitHubRepository: A public GitHub repository. This repo is where the discussions will be linked to.
chooseTheMapping: Choose the mapping between the embedding page and the embedded discussion.
titleContainsPathnameDesc: giscus will search for a discussion whose title contains the page's pathname URL component.
titleContainsURLDesc: giscus will search for a discussion whose title contains the page's URL.
titleContainsTitleDesc: giscus will search for a discussion whose title contains the page's </code> HTML tag.
titleContainsOgTitleDesc: giscus will search for a discussion whose title contains the page's HTML tag.
titleContainsSpecificTerm: Discussion title contains a specific term
titleContainsSpecificTermDesc: giscus will search for a discussion whose title contains a specific term.
specificDiscussionNumberDesc: giscus will load a specific discussion by number. This option does not support automatic discussion creation.
avoidMismatches: Avoid mismatches due to GitHub's fuzzy searching method when there are multiple discussions with similar titles. See the documentation for more details.
chooseTheDiscussionCategory: Choose the discussion category where new discussions will be created.
categoryIsNotSupported: This feature is not supported if you use the specific discussion number mapping.
recommendAnnouncementsCategory: It is recommended to use a category with the Announcements type so that new discussions can only be created by maintainers and giscus.
onlySearchInThisCategory: Only search for discussions in this category
whenSearchingOnlyThisCategory: When searching for a matching discussion, giscus will only search in this category.
chooseSpecificFeatures: Choose whether specific features should be enabled.
enableReactionsMainPost: Enable reactions for the main post
reactionsMainPostShownBeforeComments: The reactions for the discussion's main post will be shown before the comments.
discussionMetadataSentPeriodically: Discussion metadata will be sent periodically to the parent window (the embedding page). For demonstration, enable this option and open your browser's console on this page. See the documentation for more details.
placeCommentBoxAboveComments: Place the comment box above the comments
commentInputBoxWillBePlacedAboveComments: The comment input box will be placed above the comments, so that users can leave a comment without scrolling to the bottom of the discussion.
loadingCommentsWillBeDeferred: Loading of the comments will be deferred until the user scrolls near the comments container. This is done by adding loading="lazy" to the
chooseAThemeThatMatches: Choose a theme that matches your website. Can't find one that does? Contribute a new theme.
warningExternalCSSUnsafe: Warning: loading external CSS may be unsafe. Make sure you trust the author and provider of the CSS file.
addTheFollowingScriptTag: Add the following
youHaveNotConfiguredRepositoryCategory: You have not configured your <arepo>repository</arepo> and/or <acategory>category</acategory>. The values for those fields will not show up until you fill them out.
youCanCustomizeTheLayout: You can customize the container layout using the .giscus and .giscus-frame selectors from the embedding page.
